name: Akkad
declaringWar: You hinder the interests of the Ruler of Totality, and thus, you shall be vanquished.
attacked: You will see a unprecendented conquest by me, little man. Our troops are never busy in peace.
defeated: Say all you want about my land, you can smash my epics about me, but I am engraved to the memory of the gods.
introduction: I am Sargon of Akkad, the King of Akkad herself, King of Sumer, and King of the Universe. What would you like to discuss to I?
neutralHello: Welcome to the hall of the King of all Kings, Sargon.
tradeRequest: Our heartland may be far away from yours, but we offer you this agreement.
uniques: [+1 Happiness, +2 Faith, +2 Science, +1 Production] [in annexed cities]
[+15]% Strength <vs cities>
[+15]% [Culture] [in annexed cities]

name: Elam
declaringWar: A barbarian you are, your plains will be piled up by the bodies of your soldiers
attacked: Such foolish decision. I have destroyed dynasties, and you shall be one of them.
introduction: Welcome, foreign delegate of heaven. I am Kindattu of Elam.
tradeRequest: Friendo, we can exchange goods if you will do as much with us at this moment.
uniques: [+2 Culture, +3 Faith, +1 Production] from each Trade Route
Gain [20]-[40] [Faith] <upon declaring friendship>
Allied City-States provide [Science] equal to [15]% of what they produce for themselves

name: Mitanni
declaringWar: We may be different from the rest of our neighbours, but we can still destroy you.
attacked: Do you dare to challenge me?
introduction: Welcome, stranger. I am Parshatatar, king of the Hurrians.
neutralHello: MIGHTY INDRAJIT kill him! Kill him NOW!
hateHello:
LORD INDRA SEND HIM TO HELL!
Where his unholy torment may be a testament to his wretched life and wicked ways. 
His skin flayed and viscera scattered about. 
Where he will weep and cry but it will only bolster the resolve of his tormentors. 
For they hate him. 
He will know what true fear and pain is. 
But it will be no solace for there will be no end and no escape. 
His eternity will be soured with an anguish one could never imagine. 
His skin will crack like desert soil, and his veins will bleed like the Indus and the Euphrates, but never enough to quench the thirst of his abusers. 
Hell is now as hell will always be, has always been. 
But the fear into his eyes, his scent and his resolves will be a new heaven to me.
tradeRequest:
When you meet the businessman, you must shake him by the hand. 
When you meet the family man, you must shake him by the hand. 
When you meet the choo choo man, you must shake him by the hand. 
When you meet the friendly fellow, you must shake him by the hand. 
When you meet the plugging man, you must shake him by the hand.
uniques: [2] free [Chariot Archer] units appear <before the [Industrial era]> <upon declaring war with a major Civilization>
[2] free [Charging Chariot] units appear <before the [Industrial era]> <upon declaring war with a major Civilization>

name: Minoa
declaringWar: Your nation shall be crushed by our.
attacked: A lion is more civilized than what you are, do you want to go to Daedalus?
defeated: I wish you fortune for the ages to come.
introduction: I am Minos of Crete, bow down for you are mortals.
tradeRequest: Greetings mortal, we have goods to exchange, yes?
uniques: [+1 Faith] from [Cattle] tiles [in all cities]
[+1 Happiness] from all [Culture] buildings

name: Zhou
attacked: Honesty is the best policy, and you have honestly displayed your thoughts.
defeated: The general of a large army may be defeated, but you cannot defeat the determined minds of the people.
introduction: Greetings, I am Confucius, the great teacher of all.
hateHello: We are open to your words.
tradeRequest: Dear friend, it is up to your will to accept this request.
uniques: [+15]% Strength <when fighting in [Enemy Land] tiles>
[+20]% [Culture] [in all cities]

name: Magadha
declaringWar: Even if almost every citizen of ours is dead your defeat will be glorious.
attacked: Just like Arjuna your generals shall perish.
defeated: Take care of our lands, our animals, and whatever we have for you.
introduction: I am Bimbisara of the land of the Indians, and a companion of the Buddha.
hateHello: We are open to your words.
tradeRequest: Shall you accept this request by me?
uniques: [+1 Faith] from [Forest] tiles [in all cities] <after discovering [Writing]>

name: Nubia
declaringWar: Arrows will be fired to your soldier's throats, for you are more aggressive than a lion.
attacked: Nice for us that you want defeat.
defeated: Our monuments will last for eternity, for you shall certainly fall.
introduction: I am Amanitore, the Queen of Nubia. Speak more about your people, we can share information about each other.
neutralHello: Hello we are still being plagued by hordes of vicious barbarians coming from the direct opposite direction of our borders facing you Yes.
hateHello: You? Fucking seriously? What the hell do you want?
tradeRequest: Let us exchange goods for our betterment my n'wah.
uniques: [+33]% Production when constructing [Ranged] units [in all cities with a garrison]

[+20]% Strength <for [Archery] units> <when attacking> <vs cities>

name: Urartu
declaringWar: The mountains of Urartu will collapse into to on top of your filthy plains.
defeated: The mountains are our monuments, indestructible forever.
introduction: I am Argishti, king of Urartu, I welcome you to our numerous mountains.
neutralHello: I forgot what the Assyrians say in this situations.
tradeRequest: Would you be kind to accept this agreement of ours?

name: Medes
declaringWar: Such a fool you are, you shall be dealt with.
attacked:
How dare you. 
I can't believe this. 
Who could have forseen this occuring. 
A mystery
defeated: This may be your first conquest, but our legacy is definitely engrained today.
introduction: I am Cyaxares, king of the Medians.
hateHello: Fuck you all my homies hate you your capital will be razed at temperatures upwards of 1400°C.
tradeRequest: Friend you accept this agreement yes you do.

name: Etruscans
declaringWar: The gods have chosen me for this endeavour.
attacked: We will make such inflicting blows to your morale and sanity.
defeated: You may destroy our monuments, erase our language from the world, but the gods have favor in us.
introduction:
Hello?

Listen!

Listen to the stars!

It's right in front of me!

I am Tarchon, king of the Etruscans. To you we may be aliens, but do not worry, we are a friendly people.
neutralHello:
When I'm out there all alone

And feeling far from home

I'm fading into blue

And there's nothing I can do Then out on the sky like a flash

Sending me high, high, high

You rescue me

You saved me from a certain tragedy

I get messages from the stars

When you're making love to me

I get messages from the stars

You must be from another galaxy
hateHello:
When I'm far out in the night 
And searching for a light 
There's darkness all around 
And you're nowhere to be found

Then out on the sky like a flash

Sending me high, high, high

You rescue me

You saved me from a certain tragedy

I get messages from the stars

When you're making love to me

I get messages from the stars

You must be from another galaxy

name: Athens
defeated:
Beautiful Athens... you've plunged humanity into a dark age... 
Bad End.
introduction: I greet you on behalf of Athens as her elected representive; behold, the bastion of enlightenment and mother city of the Ionian Greeks.
hateHello: Come to give up your throne, tyrant?
tradeRequest: Trust us, this agreement will benefit all of us the most, I'm sure I don't have to bore you with the specifics.

spyNames: Dada da du du da do do mo ne bam ba bah

name: Sparta
declaringWar:
Laconia's fields require fresh helots, and her markets healthy slaves! 
The weak should fear the strong; now natural order will be enforced.
attacked: Sparta shall never submit to foreign cravens! Apollo smiles upon us, barbarian. You will not be walking away from this one.
defeated: No... our society was infallible, indestructable... at least we will die with it like true Spartans.
hateHello:
I would have settled our differences on the fields of battle, were we not currently preoccupied declaring war on our peasant class. 
What you may call madness, we call Sparda.
tradeRequest:
This is our offer. 
We shall await your reply by the edge of a comically large hole.

name: Thebes
declaringWar: I think it's best we deal with you now, lest you become a bigger issue.
defeated:
I leave behind no sons, and I do not fear death. But even the most blessed of men are one day doomed to watch their mothers die before them. 
As Thebes burns before me I must ask, what blessing are my own victories if they could not preseve her legacy?.
introduction: Greetings. I have been appointed to speak for Thebes, Boeotia, and all its people. May our relationship be a prosperous one.
neutralHello: Something you wish to tell me?
hateHello:
Now, we shouldn't let old grudges distract us from our mutual intrests. 
Nothing washes down bad blood like Theban wine.
tradeRequest: I think this arrangement is in both our interests, eh?

name: Lacedaemon
declaringWar: There was never any choice fool. War it must be.
defeated: What a fine battle! The Dorics are willing to serve you!

name: Palembang
declaringWar: I will enjoy hearing your last breath as you witness the destruction of your realm!
attacked: Now, witness the power of the Indonesians!
defeated: What treachery has struck us? No, what evil?
